snippet.title: 8-BIT WATERSLIDE The Game! (OFFICIAL TRAILER)
snippet.description:
THE WORLD'S BEST SELLING VIDEO GAME by tea&cheese!
iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/8-bit-waterslide/id891294826?mt=8
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dsancientgames.eightbitwaterslide
GET THE SOUNDTRACK HERE: https://teaandcheese.bandcamp.com

Ever wanted to torture a small, helpless computer game character? Well now you can in the world's first INFINITE SLIDER!

Take control of a screaming coward, TIPLER as he hurtles along this awesome pixel death slide.

But before his gruesome demise… Why not set him on fire? Kick him in the nuts? shove fruit up his butt or shower him in acid? 

It's pure, wholesome fun for the whole family!

Still not convinced you need this game?  

--Double fart jumps-- 

Yep, that's right! This game isn't just genre bustingly original, it's also super highbrow and intellectual.

8-BIT WATERSLIDE is the debut game of animation duo tea&cheese in collaboration with indie-game behemoth, Nicoll Hunt, creator of FIST OF AWESOME.

This game features absolutely no in app purchases! 

Pay once and play forever… 

and ever… 

and ever...

JOIN US!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/teache...
Twitter: https://twitter.com/teaandcheese
Tumblr: http://teaandcheese.tumblr.com/
Official website: http://www.teaandcheese.com/
